fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Vote on a player to attack at night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If this role were to be rolled, 4 other players also gain this role. All 5 Barbarians have a night chat
- A majority of at least half (rounded up) is required for an attack to go through. The more players voting to attack a player, the stronger the attack  (One player would be basic, 2 powerful, and so on, capped at Overkill)
- All barbarians start with no defense. Once the first barbarian dies, all surviving barbarians gain basic defense

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Barbarians
